fields.description:
Kitchen Sink failed to build for device with an error "Maximum call stack size exceeded". However build succeeded for simulator.
It happens on my machine in 3.0.2.GA as well

Actual result:
Build Failed (see attachment)

Expected result:
Build should succeed
fields.summary: CLI: RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded
fields.environment:
Mac osx 10.8.3 Mountain lion
Xcode 4.6.1
CLI version 3.1.0-beta
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.0.201304022134
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.0.v20130402175640

comments.body:
I have the same issue. Builds fine on sim, does not on device:
{code}
[90m[TRACE] [39m:     /usr/local/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/longjohn/dist/longjohn.js:181
[90m[TRACE] [39m:             throw e;
[90m[TRACE] [39m:                   ^
[90m[TRACE] [39m:     RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded
[90m[TRACE] [39m:     Showing first 200 notices only
[90m[TRACE] [39m:     Command /bin/sh failed with exit code 1
[31m[ERROR] [39m: [31m    ** BUILD FAILED **[39m
[31m[ERROR] [39m: [31m    The following build commands failed:[39m
[31m[ERROR] [39m: [31m    	PhaseScriptExecution Pre-Compile build/KitchenSink.build/Debug-iphoneos/KitchenSink-universal.build/Script-DABB369F12E8CB280026A6EA.sh[39m
[31m[ERROR] [39m: [31m    (1 failure)[39m
{code}

We share the following versions:
cli: 3.1.0-beta
npm: 1.2.14
node: 0.8.22

One system not experiencing this is running 10.7.3. Will recheck KS version to rule out if this is a factor. Also Xcode was 4.5 in the non-affected machine, and 4.6 on the two affected machines.

Additional note: dropping back to CLI v3.0.24 works as expected.

Running with 3.0.2GA in the KS tiapp.xml gets this error:
{code}
[90m[TRACE] [39m:         /Users/emerriman/fromgit/KitchenSink/build/iphone/build/KitchenSink.build/Debug-iphoneos/KitchenSink-universal.build/Objects-normal/armv7/TiFacebookLoginButton.o
[90m[TRACE] [39m:         /Users/emerriman/Library/Application Support/Titanium/modules/iphone/facebook/3.1.1/libfacebook.a(TiFacebookLoginButton.o)
[90m[TRACE] [39m:     duplicate symbol _OBJC_METACLASS_$_TiFacebookLoginButton in:

Tested and verified fix with:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.0.201304082106
SDK, build: 3.1.0.v20130409124549 
Devices:
iPad 4 iOS 6.1.3
iPad mini iOS 6.0
NexusS3 4.0.4
CLI 3.1.0-cr
Mac osx 10.8.3 Mountain Lion
